definition: Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: But the established brander handkerchief sutter is second, altogether has 6.
sentences.chinese: 而更老牌的帕萨特名列第二，共有6辆。

sentences.english: Satre s aesthetics of nothingness was included in his philosophy of nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 萨特早期哲学中内含的美学是一种虚无论美学。

sentences.english: Foucault replied to Sartre on several occasions.
sentences.chinese: 而福柯则在好几个场合答复了萨特。

sentences.english: This discussion also shows Satre's training in the phenomenology of Husserl and Heidegger.
sentences.chinese: 这次讨论还表明萨特训练胡塞尔与海德格尔的现象。

sentences.english: Obama would be ready to take further gambles on his personal popularity, Sutley said.
sentences.chinese: 萨特利说，奥巴马将继续将赌注放在其个人声望之上。

sentences.english: She was a thinker in her own right, and not just an appendage of Sartre.
sentences.chinese: 她争取自己应有权利，不依附于萨特而存在。

sentences.english: This May picture shows shows Inuit fishermen in Ilulissat Icefjord, Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 图为五月因纽特渔民在格陵兰伊卢利萨特冰湾垂钓。

sentences.english: In fact, Sachtleben says the Unabomber literally signed his bombs.
sentences.chinese: 萨特本表示大学炸弹客其实还在炸弹上签了名。

sentences.english: It is one and the same Satchidananda.
sentences.chinese: 这是一位，而且是相同的萨特旦安达。

sentences.english: Aerial view of Ilulissat glacier, near Ilulissat, Greenland on July 3.
sentences.chinese: 鸟瞰伊卢利萨特冰川附近，格陵兰岛，于7月3日。

sentences.english: Santana on the basis of the original Passat B2 lengthened 100mm.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔纳的基础上，原来的帕萨特B2加长100毫米。

sentences.english: Jean-Paul Sartre's dramas are the illustration and concretization of his philosophical thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 萨特的戏剧是他哲学思想的图解和具体化。

sentences.english: Hell is other people, Sartre said.
It is proposed that Sartre's principles of writing biographic works are still illuminating to us today.
sentences.chinese: 萨特写作传记作品的原则对我们具有启发意义。

sentences.english: Scarcity is the core stone of Sartre's anthropologic theory.
sentences.chinese: 关于匮乏的思想是萨特人学理论的基石。

sentences.english: Scarcity is the foundation of Sartre's anthropologic theory.
sentences.chinese: 匮乏是萨特人学理论的基石。
